data.question: Who writes the Software Requirement Specifications Document(SRS)?
What is the goal of the requirements analysis and specifications phase of software development life cycle ?
data.op1: Understanding the customer requirements and organize them in an informal document

data.question: What is the final outcome of the requirements analysis and specifications phase ?
What is noise in terms of software development ?
data.op1: Writing irrelevant statement to the software development in the SRS document
data.op2: Adding contradictory requirements in SRS document

data.question: Which of the following is not included in the Software Requirements Specification(SRS) Document ?
SRS document is called black box specification of a system because
data.op1: It does not contain the contradictory materials
data.op2: It does not contain the user documentation
data.op3: SRS document should specify only the external behaviour of the system

data.question: Which of the following expects cost estimation from SRS document ?
The goal of reading SRS document by the software developer is to :
data.op1: ensure requirements are understandable from a functionality point of view
data.op2: understand the features of the product
data.op3: ensure that the software is developed as per customer needs

data.question: Which of the following quality of SRS document ensures to compare the results of a phase with another phase ?
